_header: Of a day of well and of a day of woe
_description: On doomsday — one couplet in a Latin sermon on 2 Cor. 6:2

CULIi38.Transcription:
Of a day of wel & of a day of wo& of a day þat closyt
                    bothe tho
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 14.
